mapper.sql: MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TYPE, STATUS, ACTIVE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MEMO
mapper.insert: insert into tm_member (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TYPE, STATUS, ACTIVE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MEMO) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tm_member
MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_TYPE = #{memberType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
